description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for a Dashboard Screen, displaying an app header and a list of informational cards with placeholders for upcoming consultations, recent records, and tips.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing the main dashboard view, containing a scrollable list with a header and several info cards.

classes.name: _InfoCard
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a card with a title and subtitle, styled according to the current theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for DashboardScreen and _InfoCard, creating a scrollable view with headers and info cards.

methods.name: _InfoCard
methods.description: Constructor for creating an info card with specified title and subtitle.
